mapper.select: select id, isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, task_id, user_id, statusfirst, statussecond from read_tasklog where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into read_tasklog(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, task_id, user_id, statusfirst, statussecond) values (#{isused}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{taskId}, #{userId}, #{statusfirst}, #{statussecond})

insert into read_tasklog(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, task_id, user_id, statusfirst, statussecond) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.taskId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.statusfirst}, #{entity.statussecond})

insert into read_tasklog(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, task_id, user_id, statusfirst, statussecond) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.taskId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.statusfirst}, #{entity.statussecond})
on duplicate key update isUsed = values(isUsed), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), remarks = values(remarks), task_id = values(task_id), user_id = values(user_id), statusfirst = values(statusfirst), statussecond = values(statussecond)
mapper.update:
update read_tasklog
isUsed = #{isused},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
task_id = #{taskId},
user_id = #{userId},
statusfirst = #{statusfirst},
statussecond = #{statussecond},
where id = #{id}
